Class BaseConfig

java.lang.Object
BaseConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientConfig, ServerConfig
public abstract class BaseConfig extends Object
Abstract base class for server configurations.

Provides common configuration properties such as port number and file storage directory, along with utility method for parsing command-line arguments.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int
    b
    Number of bytes per block request.
    protected String
    filesDirectory
    The directory path where files should be stored or retrieved from.
    protected int
    port
    The port number the server should listen on.

      protected int b
      Number of bytes per block request. Used to control the size of data chunks handled by the server.
